department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal for the operation of the water treatment system
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this request for proposal for the operation of the water treatment system at the Sambault dump site in Saint-Isidore, QC.
duration_in_months: They have not specified the length of the contract. However, the contract is expected to end on 2026-09-26. Therefore, we will use the expected end date to estimate the duration.
full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement**

## **Details of the Issued Tender (ID: WS4110480590)**

*   **Issue Date:** July 21, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 25, 2023 at 2:00 PM
*   **Tender Number:** WS4110480590
*   **Amendment Number:** 4
*   **Last Date of Modification:** September 18, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Duration:** 2026-09-26 (Not Commenced)
*   **Industry Category:** Environmental Management SVC 
# **Request for Proposal**

## **Bidding Information**

*   This bid submission is open to all qualified bidders for the "Operation of pumping system for water treatment site Sambault, Saint-Isidore QC."
*   For detailed information, please refer to the bid document provided on the link below:
    http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16944991

# **Bidding Details**

## **Trade Agreements**

*   The bid is aligned with the following trade agreements: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

## **Regions of Operation**

*   The successful bidder must have a physical presence at the Sambault dump site in  Quebec.


Please fill in any necessary information to be able to contact the contract manager. 

**The successful bidder is expected to meet the  deadlines and respond to all requests in a timely manner over the duration of the contract.**



*Contact Information:*

*   Name: Antoine, Englead (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   The Procurement team is available by email and will respond in a timely manner.

The bid associated with this tender will be evaluated using a weighted evaluation plan. The tender will
